forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The morning manifests itself in a tranquil blend of partly sunny skies over Downtown San Francisco, tempered by a soft, golden light that hints at clarity yet cradles coolness. As the city begins to wake, temperatures hover around a moderate chill, gradually retreating into the afternoon’s embrace, where they are forecasted to settle at a brisk degree. The gentle breath of the west-southwest wind stirs the air, whispering secrets of the bay, with a promise of shifting clouds that will soon canvas the heavens, wrapping the skyline in a delicate, gray cloak.

As night approaches, the temperature dips, urging jackets and layered sweaters to the forefront of one’s wardrobe. A stroll along the waterfront beckons; the light from the bustling city paints reflections upon the tranquil waters, creating an inviting ambiance to enjoy a quiet cafe or perhaps engage in a contemplative walk past historical landmarks under the luminous glow of streetlights. The marine layer may be lurking in the shadows, softening the sharp edges of the skyline, but it offers a perfect backdrop for relaxation in the company of a good book or shared moments with friends, enjoying the unique atmosphere of a fog-kissed evening in this vibrant city.
